description.@en: I have adapted to the dark more than others—I see better, hear better and, if need be, fight better while shadowed.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You can see in the dark, treating Fleeting Shadows and Total Darkness as if it were Perfect Light.
